title: MedBedBot
description: Built under OmniTek Solutions, LLC. MedBedBot is a four-motor mecanum robot using an ESP32 captive portal for real-time smartphone control. It provides powered assistance to help nurses move heavy hospital beds.
builtWith: Programmed with C++ and static HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

features.title: Mecanum Wheel Support
features.detail: Full directional movement using four brushed DC gear motors.

features.title: Embedded Web Server
features.detail: Hosts a captive portal accessible by smartphone.

features.title: Responsive UI
features.detail: Built with HTML and JavaScript for real-time motor control.

features.title: Standalone Operation
features.detail: The HUZZAH32 acts as an access point and controller â€” no internet required.

bullets.label: Red
bullets.detail: Critical condition detected (e.g. fault or emergency state)

title: Tattler
description: Developed under my contract role at NT Corin. The Tatter is a sensor-based device that detects moisture and immediately sends SMS alerts to help dog owners reinforce potty training in real time.
builtWith: Programmed with C++ and static HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

features.title: ESP32 IoT Core
features.detail: C++ firmware with a captive portal for local onboarding and authentication.

features.title: Moisture Sensing
features.detail: Detects potty events reliably for timely training feedback.

features.title: Real-time SMS Alerts
features.detail: Sends instant notifications to the owner when moisture is detected.

features.title: Product Website
features.detail: Raw HTML/JavaScript frontend with a Node.js backend and MySQL for user account creation and management.

features.title: Cloud Hosting
features.detail: Product website is hosted on DigitalOcean for reliable remote access.

features.title: Enclosure & Assembly
features.detail: Onshape-designed enclosure; precision soldering integrates sensors, communication modules, and the microcontroller into a working MVP.

title: CrewTube
description: A YouTube clone made with React and MaterialUI. The web application pulls data from RapidAPI's YouTube API to display videos correlating to any category of entertainment or anything the user searches.

title: Yommers
description: Yommers is a recipe search app with ingredients, step-by-step instructions, and full nutrition facts. Filter by cuisine, diet, or calorie goals and use simple charts to see macros before you cook.

title: Sea Monster
description: A website for the company Sea Monster Crowdfunding that displays information about the games that they have funded.
builtWith: Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

title: TRVL
description: A front-end focused travel page made with React. The site features multiple tabs showcasing the various products and services provided by TRVL.

title: CP2077 Weather App
description: A Cyberpunk 2077-themed weather app built with React and Bootstrap. It uses OpenWeather API to tell users the forecast in any searched city.

title: Password Generator
builtWith: Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
